text: Tomara ki yud'dha karabe na se'isaba sampradayera sathe yara tadera pratiâ€Œsruti bhanga kareche, ara sankalpa kareche rasulake bahiskara karara, ara tara'i tomadera upare suru kareche prathame? Tomara ki tadera bhaya karo? Kintu allahâ€Œi adhikatara dabidara ye tomara tamke bhaya karabe -- yadi tomara mumina ha'o.
